data.title: Zeitgeist, The Movie - Companion Guide PDF
data.meta_description: Zeitgeist, The Movie- Companion Guide PDF - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document discusses how ancient cultures around the world widely worshipped and revered the sun as a symbol of life, warmth, and sustenance. It provides evidence from artifacts, carvings, and the writings of scholars on how sun worship began at least 10,000 years ago and persisted for millennia. The sun was seen as a powerful force that brought vision, heat, and allowed crops to grow to support life. Its daily rising and movements across the sky were seen as an important spiritual phenomenon.
